original_text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 갈릴리 가나에 이르시니 전에 물로 포도주를 만드신 곳이라 왕의 신하가 있어 그의 아들이 가버나움에서 병들었더니

sentences.original_text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 예수께서 다시 갈릴리 가나에 오셨고,

sentences.original_text: where he made the water wine.
And there was a certain nobleman,
whose son was sick at Capernaum.
